input.sentences: we started our trip by visiting the local public market looking for bargains .
the city was beautiful and we wanted to see as many sites as we could before leaving .
the downtown area had many tall buildings beautifully constructed .
we had a wonderful dinner at one of the best restaurants in town .
we had some drinks at the local pub after dinner to relax .
output.sentences: We started our trip by visiting the town market and rubbing elbows with the locals.
Leaving the heart of the city proved necessary, because on the outskirts is where there are some especially interesting sites.
We didn't neglect the downtown area however, which has many tall, beautiful buildings, a lot of them constructed since the last time we came.
This is a wonderful town to visit, with so many varied sights to see and some really great restaurants to eat at too.
I have to say, even with all the chichi spots to eat around us, we really enjoyed just hanging  out at the local pub, getting a chance to relax over a lager.
